text: The Saturn Award for Best Actress in Streaming Presentation was introduced at the 45th Saturn Awards, honoring the best performances by actresses in streaming presentations. ==Nominees== {| class="wikitable" width="800px" border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" align="center" |- ! width="80px"|Year ! width="170px"|Actress ! width="300px"|Television Program ! Streaming Service ! title: Saturn Award for Best Actress in Streaming Presentation
